sourcesContent:
My projects

Semi-Automatic Classification System

SACS

Description: Document classification for the European Commission using keywords extraction and taxonomy classification.

Role: I worked in a professional team as a Solutions Assistant at NTTDATA.

Technologies: Angular, Spring, Semantic Web...

Duration: +9 months.

Extia Hackathon Winner

Description: Competition to develop a project in less than 24 hours to reduce our carbon footprint.

Role: I provided some ideas for the final application and worked as a app developer in the team.

Technologies: React Native, Figma

Duration: 24 hours.

Group: 5 people.

Python Trading Bot

Description: School project of coding a trading bot to make money in the crypto market.

Role: I designed the strategy with bollinger bands and worked as a developer.

Technologies: Python.

Duration: 3 weeks.

Group: 2 people.

My_teams recreation

Description: Recreate the functionality of my teams creating a FTP Server and a custom protocol.

Role: I created the protocol and mostly of the server.

Technologies: C.

Duration: 4 weeks.

Group: 2-3 people.
